title: Hide and seek
content:
* The player can continue guard's training by meeting Corporal Binns at the Road to Hopeport, beyond the Town Gates.
 * As a training exercise, Jermais and the player have to find some of the fellow recruits who have hidden in Hopeforest. Corporal Binns at the Road to Hopeport has some advice to impart about tracking them down.
 * Follow the footprints and investigate the smashed mushrooms towards the East.
 * Split up with Jermais and keep exploring untill finding Dryad Glade where talking to Dryad will start the Nullify the corruption quest.
